meanings.definition: To surpass in brilliance or brightness.
meanings.sent1: The sun was outdazzling all the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outdazzled the twinkling lights on the Christmas tree.
meanings.sent3: The firework outdazzled the birthday cake candles.
meanings.sent4: The diamond outdazzled all the other gems in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was so outdazzling that it left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: To outshine or outdo in a dazzling manner.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks show outdazzled all previous celebrations.
meanings.sent2: The grand finale of the concert outdazzled the entire performance.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick outdazzled the audience's expectations.
meanings.sent4: Her talent outdazzled all the other contestants in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The city lights at night were outdazzling, creating a magical atmosphere.
